books.title: The Woman in White
books.author: Wilkie Collins
books.summary: A young drawing teacher falls in love with his aristocratic pupil, who falls victim to a devious plot to acquire her considerable fortune.

books.title: The Square Emerald
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: Scotland Yard’s first female investigator sets out to prove the innocence of a convicted forger.

books.title: Running a Thousand Miles for Freedom
books.author: William Craft
books.summary: The authors escape from slavery by posing as a slaveowner and his slave.

books.title: A General History of the Pirates
books.author: Captain Charles Johnson
books.summary: The lives and stories of the daring pirate outlaws who terrorized the Atlantic Ocean and Caribbean Sea in the 18th century.

books.title: Ozma of Oz
books.author: L. Frank Baum
books.summary: A girl gets whisked away to a fairy land and helps restore the proper rulers to the throne.

books.title: A Damsel in Distress
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A composer meets a young woman and tracks her down to a country manor, where a case of mistaken identity leads to comedy.

books.title: Henry VI, Part II
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: King Henry VI marries Margaret of Anjou and further stokes discord within his court.

books.title: The King of Elfland’s Daughter
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: The people of Erl want magic, and get their wish.

books.title: The Wisdom of Father Brown
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: Amateur detective and Catholic priest Father Brown solves mysteries in this second collection of Father Brown short stories.

books.title: The Return
books.author: Walter de la Mare
books.summary: After visiting a graveyard, a man finds his appearance has mysteriously changed.

books.title: Travel Essays
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: A collection of Robert Louis Stevenson’s travel essays.

books.title: The Secret of Father Brown
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: The fourth set of stories of a Catholic priest who is also an amateur detective.

books.title: “We”
books.author: Charles A. Lindbergh
books.summary: Legendary aviator Charles Lindbergh gives an account of his early life, how he got into flying, and his famous transatlantic flight.

books.title: A Pluralistic Universe
books.author: William James
books.summary: A philosopher gives an introduction to radical empiricism and how it relates to the experienced world.

books.title: Verses on Various Occasions
books.author: John Henry Newman
books.summary: A collection of poems by John Henry Newman.

books.title: Sunshine Sketches of a Little Town
books.author: Stephen Leacock
books.summary: A humorous account of life in the fictional small town of Mariposa.

books.title: The Land That Time Forgot
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: Stranded U-boat survivors and their rescuers contend with dangerous beasts and prehistoric people in a strange lost world.

books.title: Jungle Tales of Tarzan
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: A collection of short stories about Tarzan growing up in the jungle.

books.title: Gitanjali
books.author: Rabindranath Tagore
books.summary: Prose poems of offering translated by the author from the original Bengali.

books.title: Travel Essays
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: A collection of Robert Louis Stevenson’s travel essays.
